function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Airborne transmission of COVID-19 in restaurant settings","Impact":"Increased risk of infection for individuals in poorly ventilated restaurants","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems, increasing distance between tables, and monitoring and maintaining suitable temperatures","Technologies":"HEPA filtration, ultraviolet light, air conditioning/ventilation systems with improved filtration efficiency","People":"Customers, staff, and other individuals in the restaurant setting","Owner":"Restaurant owners and management"},{"Description":"Ineffective air filtration and aerosol exposure","Impact":"Higher risk of aerosol exposure and infection due to inadequate air filtration systems","Mitigation":"Use of HEPA filters and monitoring of air filtration efficiency","Technologies":"HEPA filters, air conditioning/ventilation systems with improved filtration efficiency","People":"Customers, staff, and other individuals in the restaurant setting","Owner":"Restaurant owners and management"},{"Description":"Lack of evidence for cost-efficient interventions for indoor transmission of respiratory infections","Impact":"Limited effectiveness in preventing indoor transmission of respiratory infections, including COVID-19","Mitigation":"Conducting further research to identify and implement cost-efficient interventions","Technologies":"Research and development of cost-efficient interventions, monitoring and surveillance systems","People":"Researchers, public health authorities, and stakeholders in the built environment","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
